title: The Scandinavian speycast
description:
In this DVD Henrik Mortensen focuses on the Scandinavian Speycast. He puts the cast in its historical perspective on a visit to the classic river Dee in Scotland showing traditional Speycasting performed by a local ghillie. Henrik travels to the breathtaking Gasp peninsula fishing three of the most beautiful rivers Grande Cascapedia, Bonaventure and Petite Cascapedia. Under demanding conditions with early season low water Henrik shows how the Scandinavian Speycast works. The DVD mixes instructional techniques with heart pounding fights with the most magnificent of all species, the Atlantic Salmon.
DVD: 74 min. English language.
Dansk, Deutsch, English, Espaol, Francais, Norsk and Svenska subtitles.

Source:DVD5 

No compression.
